original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā eko heṭṭhā viharati, eko upari.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū saṅghike vihāre upari vehāsa kuṭiyā ekaḥ heṭṭhā viharati ekaḥ upari

original: Uparimo bhikkhu āhaccapādakaṁ mañcaṁ sahasā abhinisīdi.
analyzed: uparimaḥ bhikkhu āhacca pādakam mañcam sahasā abhinisīdi

original: Mañcapādo nippatitvā heṭṭhimassa bhikkhuno matthake avatthāsi.
analyzed: mañca pādaḥ nippatitvā heṭṭhimassa bhikkhuno matthake
bhikkhū upadhāvitvā tam bhikkhum etat avocuḥ
kissa tvaṃ āvuso vissaram akāsi iti

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesi

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṁ mañcaṁ sahasā abhinisīdissatī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre upari vehāsa kuṭiyā āhacca pādakam mañcam sahasā abhinisīdissati iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū taṁ bhikkhuṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū tam bhikkhum aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, bhikkhu, saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṁ mañcaṁ sahasā abhinisīdasī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tva bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre upari vehāsa kuṭiyā āhacca pādakam mañcam sahasā abhinisīdasi iti

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṁ mañcaṁ sahasā abhinisīdissasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa saṅghike vihāre upari vehāsa kuṭiyā āhacca pādakam mañcam sahasā abhinisīdissasi
neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṁ mañcaṁ vā pīṭhaṁ vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre upari vehāsa kuṭiyā āhacca pādakam mañcam vā pīṭham vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: Saṅghike saṅghikasaññī uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṁ mañcaṁ vā pīṭhaṁ vā abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: saṅghike saṅghika saññī upari vehāsa kuṭiyā āhacca pādakam mañcam vā pīṭham vā abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: saṅghike puggalikasaññī uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṁ mañcaṁ vā pīṭhaṁ vā abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: saṅghike puggalika saññī upari vehāsa kuṭiyā āhacca pādakam mañcam vā pīṭham vā abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Puggalike puggalikasaññī aññassa puggalike, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: puggalike puggalika saññī aññassa puggalike āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: tasmiṁ ṭhito gaṇhati vā laggeti vā,
